room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
review: Did the Heist room tonight - so much fun! James was awesome and made the experience so fun! Will definitely come again!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
review: Such a blast! Tried the Heist room with 4 amazing friends. Our game master Sam was so helpful and tried her best to help us. Will definitely do this again.

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Amazing Escape Room in Bridgewater
review: It was a lot of fun. James, our game master, did a great job. His clues were good but still made us think. We didn't complete the Heist in time, so, thanks to the state, we'll have 15-20 years of "idle" time to figure it out. Lol.
